attributes.action: admit that thenew labour experiment has resulted in the most shallow, corrupt and morally bankrupt government seen in the uk for 200 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
finally we are seeing the new labour "experiment" for what it is.
History will show us that new labour was a marketing exercise buoyed up by economic decisions made by Tories.

Gordon Brown and labour have destroyed the economy after Thatcher (second only to Churchill as the PM of the century) and successors built.

Labour have proved their ineptitude at governance
